hanzi-su-wiki:
悪

Значения

Зло; плохой, дурной, злой

Мнемоника

  • Бракованное 亜, дурное сердце 心, когда всё ненавистно.

  • "Злые чувства в их (как 亜) сердцах 心."

Варианты

惡, 恶

è
Japanese variant of 恶
Японский вариант 恶
rtega_mnemonic:
悪悪RS
X		evil, bad
  • person with a "subordinate" 亜 heart 心 likened to a huge tree which is not yet shaped into nice timber 亜
弊 凶 邪

悪悪RSevil, wicked, bad, foul
  • heart 心 below 亜 good things
弊 凶 邪
heisig_constituent: bad, Asia, roman two, mouth, heart
Keyword_KANJIDIC: bad, vice, rascal, false, evil, wrong
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: плохой, порок, мошенник, ложь, зло, неправильно
koohiiStory1: Because Asian people started to eat Western food, their hearts became bad and they started having heart attacks.
koohiiStory2: Asian hearts are bad and evil. They invented so much martial arts: karate, judo, kungfu, muay thai, silat, etc... just to hurt each other. They torture their own people (China, North Korea). They torture other people (Japan in China and Korea). And they are able to hide all this behind their nice facade of kindness. Bad, bad Asians. (did i shatter some people´s ideas on Asia? my bad).
kunYomi: わる.い、わる-、あ.し、にく.い、-にく.い、ああ、いずくに、いずくんぞ、にく.む
jp_example_words:
悪(あく): evil, wickedness
悪日(あくび): unlucky day
悪化(あっか): deterioration, growing worse, aggravation, degeneration, corruption
悪口(あっこう): abuse, insult, slander, evil speaking
悪戯(いたずら): tease, prank, trick, practical joke, mischief
改悪(かいあく): deterioration, changing for the worse
決まり悪い(きまりわるい): feeling awkward, being ashamed
悪い(にくい): hateful, abominable, poor-looking
善し悪し(よしあし): good or bad, merits or demerits, quality, suitability
悪者(わるもの): bad fellow, rascal, ruffian, scoundrel
悪魔(あくま): evil spirit, devil, demon
意地悪(いじわる): malicious, ill-tempered, unkind
悪口(わるくち): abuse, insult, slander, evil speaking
悪い(わるい): bad, inferior
jp_readingExamples: 悪事 (あくじ), 悪意 (あくい), 醜悪 (しゅうあく), 悪い (わる.い)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In Asia they assume everyone's heart is automatically bad and evil.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You don't want a bunch of evil in your heart, do you? No, I didn't think so.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Luckily, people in Asia know how to get the evil badness out of your heart with acupuncture (あく).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Acupuncture was originally invented in Asia a long, long time ago, to stop the bad chi from going through your heart.
Ru_Meaning: bad, vice, rascal, false, evil, wrong
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the heart (心) of Asia (亜) is bad

яп. вм. 恶

悪

Значения

Зло; плохой, дурной, злой

Мнемоника

  • Бракованное 亜, дурное сердце 心, когда всё ненавистно.

  • "Злые чувства в их (как 亜) сердцах 心."

Варианты

惡, 恶

Radicals: 亜, 心  (asia, heart)
Meaning Mnemonic
In Asia they assume everyone's heart is automatically bad and evil.
You don't want a bunch of evil in your heart, do you? No, I didn't think so.
Reading Mnemonic
Luckily, people in Asia know how to get the evil badness out of your heart with acupuncture (あく).
Acupuncture was originally invented in Asia a long, long time ago, to stop the bad chi from going through your heart.
